document.full_text: a former university of san diego star basketball player, along with another former player and former assistant coach, were charged with running a sports betting business to affect the outcome of games.
document.title: ex-u.s.d. star figures in sports bribery indictment
lines_and_colors: a former university of san diego star basketball player, along with another former player and former assistant coach, were charged with running a sports betting business to affect the outcome of games.
